    • runTournament

      public void runTournament(Player player)
      THis runs the entire tournament. Including 2 round robins (groupA and groupB), semi-finals, and final. Outputs the results and winner information Uses 2 arrays for battle results in round robin, groupA and groupB
      Parameters:
      player - the player or user (Gizmo)

    • runGroup

      This runs the round robin and calculates the win count and the eventual winner and runner up
      Parameters:
      characters - the characters in the character array
      Returns:
      the results (winner and the runner up) from the battle rounds

    • findHighestWinCount

      private Battle.CharacterWithWinCount findHighestWinCount(Battle.CharacterWithWinCount[] characters)
      This finds the highest number (win count) in the array. replacing it when finding a higher win count.
      Parameters:
      characters - the character names from the CharacterWithWinCount array
      Returns:
      the highest wni count total (number) in the array
